list_definition.definition: thin cloth used eg to cover wounds

list_ex_of_english: Mechanical debridement can be easily accomplished by letting the saline gauze dressing dry before removal.

Merozoites were filtered through gauze to remove debris.
Snails were maintained, for logistic reasons, in groups of 3 within experimental pots (15i10i5 cm) divided with gauze into 3 individual sections.

This gauze has less reserve elasticity than nylon and is not affected by changes in humidity.
